alert.note: Alert for Muskegon; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 17 at 9:14PM EDT until September 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM EDT SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Muskegon and Ottawa counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase tonight and continue into the day on Sunday. Dangerous waves and currents will develop late tonight and continue into Sunday. Muskegon and Ottawa County beaches will see dangerous conditions develop on Sunday.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
